alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 8:59PM AKST until December 23 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occuring. Travel will be difficult. Additional snow accumulations of 2 inches are expected. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...The Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...6 AM Wednesday to 6 AM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
